overview: Amber Lynn is a porn icon. And this movie is devoted to some of her and her friend's hottest scenes! Get it on with the luscious Amber Lynn! You know you want it! What do you get when Amber Lynn and nine other luscious sex stars act out their wildest fantasies under the direction of XRCO hall-of-famer Alex de Renzy? 10 good reasons to check out LET'S GET IT ON with Amber Lynn.
title: Let's Get It On
